api.description: API defines the version to use either REST(v1) or dashDB(v2) as a service

v1.description: The api version v1 uses REST services deployed on server defined below.

v2.description: The api version v2 use dashDB as a service via vcap environmental variables. In case, if there is no service attached with the application, it used following connection variables

v3.description: The api version v2 use dashDB as a service via vcap environmental variables. In case, if there is no service attached with the application, it used following connection variables
